name: The Basket Ministry
description: The Basket Ministry is a nonprofit food pantry organization of the Corbin Church of the Nazarene that provides food assistance and essential household supplies to individuals and families in need. The ministry serves the Corbin community with food distribution services and operates as a charitable organization to help those facing food insecurity.
source: Verified from official Facebook page and multiple resource directories
hours_of_operation: Call for current hours - typically operates on Fridays
eligibility_requirements: Open to individuals and families in need of food assistance
populations_served: Low-income individuals and families, community members in need
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-27. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/basketministry/. Email lorie@creechngibbs.com provided on Facebook page. Organization confirmed as The Basket Ministry, a nonprofit organization of the Corbin Church of the Nazarene. Services verified as food pantry and household supplies assistance. Facebook page verified current and accessible with 445+ likes and active community engagement. All information cross-referenced with Google search results and resource directories for consistency.
